param.name: executor_pools
param.label: Select executor pools
param.help: Select executor pools to run GT packets. If more than one pool is selected the smart pool selector will distribute the load to the pools.

param.name: gt_user
param.label: GT user name
param.help: GT_USER parameter in gtdistd file and linux user in scheduler VM

param.name: license
param.label: License server
param.help: License servers: port1@host1:port2@host2. On Windows, the separator is a semicolon.

param.name: ds_cycle
param.label: Core demand sensing cycle duration [s]
param.help: Specify the cycle duration for sensing the core demand

param.name: od_frac
param.label: Over demand satisfaction fraction [0,1]
param.help: Fraction of the core over demand to satisfy every cycle. If the value 1 is selected all the core over demand is satisfied in just one cycle. Select less than 1 if the packet runtime is much smaller than VM startup time.
